snippet: A seminude painted woman and her boyfriend were arrested on drug and prostitution charges, while a businessman was accused of attacking two other women.
abstract: Topless street performer Destiny Romero and her boyfriend Jason Perez are arrested in Times Square after offering drugs and sex to undercover police officers; two other seminude women, known as desnudas, are attacked after one is accused of stealing a wallet.
lead_paragraph: A seminude painted woman and her boyfriend were arrested on drug and prostitution charges, while a businessman was accused of attacking two other women.

headline.main: Times Square Topless Woman Is Arrested; 2 Others Are Assaulted, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Times Sq. Topless Woman Is Arrested; 2 Others Are Assaulted, Police Say
